DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, and activity of NGM282 in patients with Primary Biliary Cirrhosis.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of NGM282 in Patients With Primary Biliary Cirrhosis
DOC.criteria: Males or females, between 18 and 75 years of age, inclusive PBC diagnosis consistent with AASLD and EASL guidelines Stable dose of UDCA Chronic liver disease of a nonPBC etiology Evidence of clinically significant hepatic decompensation
